Question: This person gave Congressional testimony on the Benghazi attack on January 23, 2013.
Hints: It and this person's own visits encouraged women to make themselves heard in the Northern Ireland peace process.
This person won the election on November 7, 2000, with 55 percent of the vote to Lazio's 43 percent.
Bill **** returned to the governor's office two years later by winning the election of 1982.
